item.title: Remote Desktop Gateway Woes and NPS Logging
item.description: I recently set up a new lab at home and was installing Remote Desktop Gateway on Windows Server 2022. While setting it up, and also configuring RAS as a virtual router, I was very confused as to why I kept getting moaned at while attempting to RDP to a system using the gateway: Remote Desktop canâ€™t connect to the remote computer for one of these reasons I was absolutely confident everything was configured correctly:
